Literature.Title: Antifungal In Vitro Activity of Pilosulin- and Ponericin-Like Peptides from the Giant Ant Dinoponera quadriceps and Synergistic Effects with Antimycotic Drugs.
Literature.Author: Dodou Lima HV, de Paula Cavalcante CS, Rádis-Baptista G

Literature.Title: Antimicrobial activity of synthetic Dq-3162, a 28-residue ponericin G-like dinoponeratoxin from the giant ant Dinoponera quadriceps venom, against carbapenem-resistant bacteria.
Literature.Author: Dodou Lima HV, Sidrim de Paula Cavalcante C, Rádis-Baptista G
